article_title: 3 Takeaways From Hospital Tax Exemption Ruling
article_text:
3 Takeaways From Hospital Tax Exemption Ruling

Law360, New York (July 7, 2015, 4:39 PM ET) -- A recent New Jersey Tax Court decision eliminating Morristown Memorial Hospital's property tax exemption will open the door for tax entities to pursue payments from nonprofit hospitals, encourage municipalities to negotiate payments in lieu of taxes and get state legislators to redefine tax exemptions, experts say.



Here are three takeaways from the ruling:



Mixing Charity and Profits Leads To Lawsuits
